item.title: Homework 1
item.description: This homework is due on 8 February 2021 at 11:59PM via Gradescope. Please submit a .zip file containing physcat_sp21_hw1_p1.ipynb physcat_sp21_hw1_p3.ipynb which you can download below. Setup Welcome to PhysCat! Like many courses, the first thing you’re going to have to do is set up a programming environment that has all the libraries you’ll need. For at least the first portion of this course we will be using anaconda to handle package management.
